intro: Liparia sphaerica, commonly known as the globe lipara, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its compact, globular growth habit. The plant produces small, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in well-drained soils and prefers full sun to partial shade. Liparia sphaerica is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and drought tolerance.
